Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

macpie 1.1.0

New functions

  • Initial CRAN release of macpie: a scalable R toolkit for high-throughput transcriptomic (HTTr) analysis.
  • Provides end-to-end support for MAC-seq and other HTTr data, including:
    • Quality control metrics: validate_metadata(), compute_qc_metrics(), plot_rle, plot_mds(), etc.
    • Differential expression: compute_single_de(), compute_multi_de(), plot_volcano(), plot_counts().
    • Support for chemical structure processing: compute_chem_descriptors(), compute_smiles(), compute_single_dose_response(), compute_multi_screen_profile().

On this page

Developed by Nenad Bartonicek, Xin Liu, Laura Twomey, Michelle Meier, Richard Lupat, Stuart Craig, David Yoannidis, Jason Li, Tim Semple, Kaylene J Simpson, Mark X Li, Susanne Ramm.
